scripts.clean-up: rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json .storybook-static-develop .storybook-static-release coverage && npm i lerna -S && lerna run clean-up --stream
scripts.install-papillonbits-latest: npm i "@papillonbits/components"@latest && npm i "@papillonbits/library"@latest && lerna run install-papillonbits-latest --stream
scripts.restore-build-folders: rm -rf packages/library/build && mkdir packages/library/build && mv packages/library/a11y packages/library/array packages/library/auth packages/library/boolean packages/library/browser packages/library/date packages/library/event packages/library/hooks packages/library/number packages/library/object packages/library/pagination packages/library/sort packages/library/store packages/library/string packages/library/build/
scripts.release: npm run collect-build-folders && lerna publish && npm run restore-build-folders
scripts.bootstrap-test: npm-run-all build-test build-storybook-develop build-storybook-release lint:format test report-coverage
scripts.bootstrap-acceptance: npm-run-all build-acceptance build-storybook-develop build-storybook-release lint:format test report-coverage
scripts.bootstrap-release: npm-run-all build-release build-storybook-develop build-storybook-release lint:format test report-coverage
